remarks: The orthocomplement of an atom is a co-atom (lattice hyperplane). (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lhpoc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpoc.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
lhpoc.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpoc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpoc2N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. B ) -> ( W e. A <-> ( ._|_ ` W ) e. H ) ) $.
